arm_group.description: Type II diabetes mellitus, body constitution

brief_summary.textblock:
By analyzing the relationship between the body constitution and the progression of Type II
      diabetes mellitus, its morbidities, mortality and the impact of the life quality, we try to
      provide an useful tool, body constitution, to stratify the patients accordingly for
      individualized health care.

clinical_study.brief_title: Prospective Cohort Study of the Body Constitution Among Type II Diabetes Mellitus Patients

detailed_description.textblock:
The study participants are recruited from the Diabetes Shared Care Network of the Taichung
      Veterans General Hospital (Taichung, Taiwan)

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:

          -  patient diagnosed as Type II diabetes mellitus by  Endocrinology specialist.

          -  aged from 20 to 75 years old.

          -  clear conscious, willing to join the program.

        Exclusion Criteria:

          -  Severe mental illness, which lead to unable to fulfill the questionaire

          -  Major surgical intervention,medical events (such as acute myocardial infarction,
             cerebral vascular accident...et al.,), chemotherapy  or radiation therapy within past
             one month , which made body constitution measurement unavailable.

study_pop.textblock:
1000 type II diabetes mellitus patients recruited from the Endocrinology & Metabolism out
        patient clinic of Taichung Veterans General Hospital.

clinical_study.official_title: Prospective Cohort Study of the Body Constitution Among Type II Diabetes Mellitus Patients

primary_outcome.measure: Body constitution of type II diabetes mellitus patients
primary_outcome.time_frame: Two years follow up after being recruited

required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on June 04, 2014
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

secondary_outcome.measure: All cause mortality of type II diabetes mellitus patients
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Two years follow up after being recruited

secondary_outcome.measure: Life quality of diabetes mellitus patients
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Two years follow up after being recruited

secondary_outcome.measure: Diabetic retinopathy of type II diabetes mellitus patients
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Two years follow up after being recruited

secondary_outcome.measure: Diabetic nephropathy of type II diabetes mellitus patients
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Two years follow up after being recruited

secondary_outcome.measure: Diabetic neuropathy of type II diabetes mellitus patients
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Two years follow up after being recruited

clinical_study.study_design: Observational Model: Cohort, Time Perspective: Prospective
